1.0.name: wordpress/eyebees
1.0.description: Eyebees widget is a tool for bloggers and site-owners.It lets the current visitors of any site see each other, chat and interact. each bee represents a visitor,click on a bee and jump to it's location or click on a name and chat. groups of bees are on the same page, connect with them and know the buzz. Requires PHP5 and Javascript enabled browsers.
